GSD.description:
mmc: host: Return an error when ->enable_sdio_irq() ops is missing

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit fdbc5cd071e5b0fe286e8bedd467d7ba6bea3002. For more details please see the references link.
